metadata.title: CVE-2020-25742 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: pci_change_irq_level in hw/pci/pci.c in QEMU before 5.1.1 has a NULL pointer dereference because pci_get_bus() might not return a valid pointer.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-01-05, the proposed patch has not been commited upstream

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-01-05').
